# QI.jl Documentation



<a id='QI.ket-Tuple{Int64,Int64}' href='#QI.ket-Tuple{Int64,Int64}'>#</a>
**`QI.ket`** &mdash; *Method*.



```
ket(val::Int, dim::Int; sparse=false)

A ket of length `dim` with the entry `val` equal to one.
```
